Articles.Content: How do you guys make sure your gear are aligned? The tool in adjustable landing gear was awesome but now without those gear working is there a similar tool to use with the default wheels?
F key in editor - absolute mode - rotate gears a little and you'll see for yourself. Use angle snap in descrete mode.
Thanks I'll give it a try

I check the landing gear height moving the entire plane to the bottom of the SPH until the wheels just clip into the floor. It's pretty obvious if you have gear at the wrong height / angle at that point.

Absolute mode angle-snap for both offset and rotation help.
@grant977:
Mount 'em on flat surfaces, use the 90-degree rotation to point them straight down, then use the offset tool to position them where they need to be.
